src:
AC Milan Rekrut Pemain Muda Barcelona Ini?
06 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Serie A, AC Milan diberitakan akan mendatangkan gelandang baru di bulan Januari nanti. Rossonerri diberitakan akan mendatangkan Carles Alena dari Barcelona.
Membeli gelandang baru merupakan prioritas AC Milan di bulan Januari nanti. Pelatih mereka, Stefano Pioli diberitakan tidak puas dengan opsi gelandang yang dimiliki Rossonerri saat ini.
Ada beberapa nama yang dikaitkan dengan Milan. Namun Milan diberitakan belum mengambil langkah untuk pemain-pemain tersebut.
Namun Calciomercato mengklaim bahwa MIlan sudah mengunci target transfer mereka. Raksasa Serie A itu berencana merekrut Carles Alena dari Barcelona.

Simak manuver transfer Milan untuk Alena di bawah ini.
text:
AC Milan Recruit Barcelona Youth Players?
Nov 6 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Serie A club AC Milan are reported to be bringing in a new midfielder in January. Rossonerri reportedly will bring Carles Alena from Barcelona.
Buying a new midfielder is AC Milan's priority in January. Their coach, Stefano Pioli is reported to be dissatisfied with the midfielder option that Rossonerri currently has.
There are several names associated with Milan. But Milan reportedly has not taken steps for these players.
But Calciomercato claims that MIlan has locked their transfer target. The Serie A giant plans to recruit Carles Alena from Barcelona.

Check out the Milan transfer maneuver for Alena below.
